thread.title: See how Beyonce created a storm at Ciara's fancy dress bash
thread.title_full: See how Beyonce created a storm at Ciara's fancy dress bash

title: See how Beyonce created a storm at Ciara's fancy dress bash
text:
See how Beyonce created a storm at Ciara's fancy dress bash See how Beyonce created a storm at Ciara's fancy dress bash Share 
Beyonce certainly whipped up a storm when she attended music pal Ciara’s fancy dress party. 
The Drunk In Love star transformed into an X-Men character for the surprise 30th birthday bash at the Warner Bros lot in Burbank, California. 
And she went all out to impress in her cape, white wig and dramatic contact lenses as Storm, the superhero mutant who can control the weather. 
She was joined at the bash by her Destiny’s Child bandmate Kelly Rowland, tennis champ Serena Williams and actress Lily Collins. Kelly shared the moment on her Instagram account. 
According to People, birthday girl Ciara was overwhelmed by the party, organised by her Seattle Seahawks quarterback boyfriend Russell Wilson. 
She arrived at the venue dressed as Catwoman, to be whisked away by her own “Batman” in the Batmobile. 
— Ciara (@ciara) October 26, 2015 Share article 
Around 100 of her family and friends were waiting for her at the Batman exhibit on the lot, including her 17-month-old son Future Zahir, dressed as a mini Superman. Promoted Stories
